السلام عليكم

سؤال فى التصميم يا شباب - لو جبت تمبلت Admin بس المشكلة ان مفيهاش RTL - هل لو اشتغلت عليها زى ما هى بس باللغة العربية لأسماء القوائم وخلافه يبقا غلط ويبقا شغل مش صح والا ايه - لأن غالبية Admin Tempalte مش لاقى فيهم RTL ؟

طبعا سؤالى بخصوص ان التمبلت يكون فيه قائمه جانبية Left Side Bar - فهل ده لو القائمة فوق يعنى Top التصميم كده يكون حديث او زى اللى ماشى حاليا والا كده قديم ؟

data.message: لازم يتحول RTL و دى حاجة سهولتها او صعوبتها متوقفة على مستوى الكود اللى مكتوب بيه الـ template

1- There are tons of admin themes support RTL, at least the best ones do.
2- It depends on many factor, your user *not customer*, project budget, customer's expectations, From my experience, it doesn't matter really if ur app is 100% RTL or not at all, the main concern however, is u have to make the UI explanatory... a prove is that most of mobile apps, keep their layout when switching to arabic.
If u r using css framework like UIkit or bootstrap, U might wanna consider adding the style : direction:rtl; to the body element and see the magic n just fix the ugly stuff... again it deosn't really matter, your customer is not a desginer and probably gonna accept whatever you give him as long as it's simple to use and explanatory.

If you decide to go for the conversion, CSSJanus will save you some of the effort if not all of it.

CSSJanus: https://cssjanus.github.io

ممكن تراجع هذا السؤال وإجابته عسى ان يكون فيه مساعدة:
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/12284514/inverted-css-properties-to-change-to-rtl

Additional to @Muhammad Hasan Also there is an RTL Bootstrap version available or few selectors to add to urs. You can use it as it with LTR "But" sure you will need some modifications for many of elements and font sizes to look fine. 

If I'm in your situation and have budget and time I will choose to make it RTL.

For the side or top menu for admin template, I think the side menu is more common and flexible these days. Top menus put limits but if your app is simple and doesn't need 10+ sections then no problems.
